amendment.description: Amendment encourages teacher mentoring programs, outlines the essential components of such programs, and gives States flexibility for alternative certification programs for teachers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 2 printed in H.Rept. 106-240 to encourage teacher mentoring programs, outline their essential components, and strengthen the alternative certification program for teachers.
